Her Majesty's Attorney General (Appellant) ex parte Rusbridger and another (Respondent)ONTHURSDAY 26 JUNE 2003TheAppellateCommitteecomprised:
Lord Steyn Lord Hutton Lord Scott of Foscote Lord Rodger of Earlsferry Lord Walker of Gestingthorpe HOUSEOFLORDSOPINIONSOFTHELORDSOFAPPEALFORJUDGMENTINTHECAUSEReginav.HerMajesty'sAttorneyGeneral(Appellant)exparteRusbridgerandanother(Respondent) [2003] UKHL 38

P.SENT: (6) A declaration under this section ('a declaration of incompatibility') -

At the hearing before the House Mr Sales, counsel for the Attorney-General, was careful to make no submissions as to the proper interpretation of section 3 of the Treason Felony Act 1848 ("the 1848 Act").
